document.title: WEL_SCROLL_BAR
document.paragraph:
A ../../reference/controls/WEL_SCROLL_BAR_chart.xmlWEL_SCROLL_BAR control is an encapsulation of the Windows scroll bar control and is often used to specify which portion of a large control that cannot be viewed completely, is currently visible.
2Appearance A ../../reference/controls/WEL_SCROLL_BAR_chart.xmlWEL_SCROLL_BAR created with make_horizontal.
images/wel_scroll_bar_horizontal.png wel_scroll_bar_horizontal
A ../../reference/controls/WEL_SCROLL_BAR_chart.xmlWEL_SCROLL_BAR created with make_vertical.
images/wel_scroll_bar_vertical.png wel_scroll_bar_vertical
